sentence: The article “Rethinking Repair” made me think about the concept of repair as I worked through this assignment, and that it goes beyond fixing broken items, but also thinking about repurposing and reusing.
label: neutral

sentence: Materials 	•	Mechanical pencil and pen 	•	Bottle cap 	•	Buttons 	•	Hand sanitizer bottle  Parts  	•	additional items added during process: wooden base, cloth to connect springs and base  Tools 	•	Scissors 	•	Super glue 	•	Needle and thread   Design sketch/ Bobble Toy  Process   Video  Final The springs were different sizes/heights, which caused the base to be slanted.
